column4: hello, would anyone be willing to help me to troubleshoot wvdial?
apt-cache search filename
I run setup for the modem and put a username a pword in for my isp...
sometime it hangs after -->Modem initialized   -->Please enter password(or empy password to stop):
We are trying to start a community program, ubuntu on donated systems for those who can't afford.
but I'm having a heck of a time with this modem
does anyone do dial up anymore?
..setup?
use pppconfig, not wvdial
thanks, that got me closer, I'm actually getting a handshake, but can't tell why it fails
my username and password are definitely correct
sorry, just dropped back in
try this: start a gnome-terminal, and execute tail -f /var/log/syslog
then, in another gnome terminal, try pon. There may be some useful messages on the other terminal
ok, LCP: timeout sending Config-Requests, connection terminated, receive seril link is not 8-bit clean: Problem: all had bit 7 set to 0
I have _never_ seen anything like that, so, maybe direwolf has some pointers
should I be able to see my password in the clear in the logs, I don't, but I'm just curious if that's the problem
maybe, paste the total errors to pastebin, I may recognize something :)
I've diagnosed dialup errrors since 300kbs
i'm wondering if maybe I need our vpn client
not if it is just 'get my machine talking to another machine that will be my gateway'. But, corporate stuff cancels all normality.
